timeline.bodyText: this will anger the lint gods
timeline.author: als364

timeline.bodyText: I'm not totally happy with this name because list-style-position is kind of an obscure property for OutsideUnorderedList to have a meaning but alternatives would be terribly wordy like UnorderedListWithBulletsLeftAlignedInsteadOfWords or something.
timeline.author: als364

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I couldn't come up with a better name offhand, so ended up going with this. I don't really like this either. Maybe BulletAlignedUnorderedList?
replies.author: s-rubenstein

timeline.bodyText: Was this just split into two lines opportunistically for readability?
timeline.author: als364
